options.E: ensure that ServletB synchronizes on the session object when setting session attributes
options.F: enclose lines 21-22 in a synchronized block: synchronized(this) { session.setAttribute(key, “Hello”); value = session.getAttribute(key); }
options.G: enclose lines 21-22 in a synchronized block: synchronized(session) { session.setAttribute(key, “Hello”); value = session.getAttribute(key); }
